name: European Regions Airline Association Ltd.
goal:
ERA' mission:

ERA is, and will remain, the principal body that represents the interests of organisations involved in intra-European air transport by:
a) influencing regulatory and environmental conditions,
b) facilitating technical cooperation and advancement, and
c) gaining public and political support
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
